Articles.Content:
how many people here live stream over twitch?

If you do do you usually have a goal in mind for the stream? (mun landing, laythe base, etc)

I have a few days off this week and might try to build a Laythe base, would that be worth streaming?

Do people actually watch live streams other than the dev streams?

No, I livestream As much as I can. I have 36 followers to twich and 7 subs on youtube(almost everything I stream goes on youtube)

here's my channels -snip-

you'd be supprised what people will watch in a stream... I honestly dn't think I'm that entertaining but people watch nonetheless.

Edited May 21, 2013 by KasperVld
this is not a stream advertisement thread
would also like to point out I Have only been streaming for 3 weeks or less.
Maybe I will give it a try on my time off
